# Basic instructions

For this assignment, we will work with real data that include observations with historical credit applicants who is rated as **Good** or **Bad** credit (encoded as 1 and 0 respectively in the response variable). The goal is obtain a model that may be used to determine if new applicants present a good or bad credit risk.
For being able to do so, We will apply the CRISP-DM model and communicate the results in this report.

There are a few milestones for our final project:
